newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: European feeds remain calm in afternoon.
newsitem.headline: European feeds remain calm in afternoon.

text.p: Business on the European meals and feeds market remained calm this afternoon with only a few trades reported, market sources said.

"The higher seller prices after yesterday's surge in Chicago soycomplex futures on USDA revised its U.S. soybean stocks downwards by 22 million bushels and calls for a weaker Chicago opening this afternoon kept a lid on activity," one broker said.
May/Sept Brazilian soymeal pellets traded at $311 a tonne cif Rotterdam and spot Argentine sunmeal pellets traded $4 up at $144 a tonne fob Rotteram.--KAREL LUIMES +31 20 504 5832
